body: Though the art is good, the plot, like other NTRs of this type, just plays to a distorted sexual fantasy. Consider how shallow their relationship would actually be and how little they would actually get along. Just like the characters have to have no brain to be in these situations, you have to have your brain turned off to enjoy these types of doujin.

And before insulting main characters for being NTR’d and saying it’s their fault, most of the time it never is their fault. Just because they got the shitty stick of the genetic jar doesn’t mean that they’re bad at relationships, that doesn’t mean that it’s their fault that their girlfriends got taken away, being poor isn’t their fault and being kind is bad. It all comes down to the woman and the person doing the cucking, both of them are in the wrong. The woman is wrong for being unloyal and falling into pleasure while the Cucker (Dunno what it’s called) is in the wrong for even trying. In society, these people are called “sluts” and “scum.” And if any girls read this, if you fall into pleasure this easily then you probably shouldn’t be in a relationship. And if any people who like cucking are reading this, you should stop because someday you’ll fuck the wrong mans wife and get shot. Hell maybe you’ll take the slow way out and fuck a politicians wife, bye bye job, future, and life.

Tbh yeah his dick is long but comparing it to white dude, “black chad” has a needle dick. He traded height of width, plus we never saw an X-ray for white dude so her pussy getting stretched wide I bet.


And y’all mother fuckers are terrible human beings, I get liking cuck porn but please leave your “Take that cuck!” comments somewhere else, Adultery is a legitimate issue and could drive people to suicide, especially someone who’s mentally unstable or has a history of depression and suicide attempts in the past. The feeling of betrayal is a lot more painful than one would expect, mainly because people who read this probably have never been in a serious relationship before, but to insult someone (be it a drawing or real person) for being betrayed is plain wrong. I get letting your fantasies out, which is why I’m here on this site in the first place, but please be a decent human being and refrain from being so aggressive. And before you call me a vanilla fag, I like a little NTR too.
